title: Privateer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Condemn one player
-You may prosecute the night after a player you condemn is lynched
-You swap roles with whoever you condemn for a night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -Players who you swap roles with may not prosecute, nor swap roles with anther player.

desc:
Post 3263
*You are a thief hired by a corrupt government*
